p: To be included in the analysis of this review, the following had to be available for the retrieved papers: (1) the country of interest, (2) the type and features of the model, (3) the mode of transmission discussed in the study, (4) the assessment process, (5) details of the main risk factors involved in the transmission, (6) and if any details of the practical implications arising from the study. The extracted data were compiled in an Excel datasheet and subsequently a descriptive analysis was performed to provide state-of-the-art insights on FMD epidemic models and risk analysis.
